Reviews.Title: “My Roman home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Seraphial
Reviews.Content: 5 night stay rome lot research various hostels hotels available trevi fountainspanish steps consistently rated lot website reviews bit bullet im glad extremely easy block station barberini 2 stops termini realise close sites rome trevi extremely close spanish steps blocks flight stairs lift available greeted smiling patty door patty 3rd generation owner lovely presence house hostel nor pension hotel extension pattys home guests encouraged treat fancy locks tvs air con etc theres flyers door patty wealth knowledge share insight rome stayed single overlooking front door ive heard reviews mention noise fine bright sunny single comfortable sported sink cupboard clean cleaner day tidy theres separate bathroom showertoilet hall maintained suppose ones expectations adjusted pattys home youre comfortable kinda space lovely separates hostels level service amenities similar elsewhere id definitely recommend travellers personable experience rome

Reviews.Title: “Great value, great location, character hotel”
Reviews.Author: Steve B
Reviews.Content: found hotel easily located sightseeing rome plenty restaurants bars nearby quirky hotel lots character owner patty friendly helpful double ensuite spacious simply furnished warm cosy throughout freezing temperatures february stay bed comfortable slept bathroom modern maintained standard cleanliness improvement suggest larger fluffier towels enjoyed stay stay time rome excellent value money

Reviews.Title: “Cute but uncomfortable.”
Reviews.Author: M A
Reviews.Content: hotel ac summer rome awful fine booked window due hotel floor popular bar heard people talking night busy morning smelled smoke cigarettes otherwise hotel cute clean loud location bar shared bathroom facilities hotel deal inexpensive qualities night moved hotels street paying 30 euro night exact price night accommodations including ac private bathroom quiet

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel/homestay”
Reviews.Author: KrisztaHelsinki
Reviews.Content: bit difficult hotel darkness building shared hotel look door bell left otherwise location 10 min trevi 15 min spagna owner nice friendly silent perfectly silent clean time sleep home own bathroom common noted booking huge nice decor comfortable bed hotel stayed recommend families gem heart rome town resonable price wish hotels travel lot experience wish owner patty continue

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money. Clean and perfect location”
Reviews.Author: One-sR
Reviews.Content: hotels rome booked easter pope found little hotel location excellent metro spanish steps trevi fountain patty friendly helpfull shared bathroom clean didnt wait shower te morning dont expect fancy hotel looking value money cosey hotel center rome excellent

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Boccaccio - A Great Little Find in the Historic Centre”
Reviews.Author: CinziaVancouver
Reviews.Content: little ecofriendly hotel it’s centrally located 5 minute walk trevi fountain spanish steps pantheon piazza navona walking distance roma termini metro line barbarini 2 stops roma termini walk takes 1520 minutes hotel building hotel de petris enter main floor 2 liftselevators lift hotel slightly directly front hotel de petris hop onto lift press elevator door hotel front arrived 11pm patrizia graciously waiting patrizia owner hotel home inside guest front slightly left emailed day advising plane late patrizia promptly replied waiting arrival keys key hotel hotel entrance 1st floor outside entrance building basically 24 hour access booked single shared bathroom shared shower wait facilities 2 bathrooms shower hallway faced via del ambiance italian restaurants night street shut window don’t sound included sink mirror towels eco friendly soaps shower foam bed lamp closet desk lamp fan lovely window double bed energy conserving light bulbs throughout property towels changed everyday photo eco policy reading free wifi available 930 am 1100 pm lobby laptop sit lovely seating fyi historical buildings wifi signal reach bedrooms main lobby lots brochures rome sight seeing complimentary maps rome breakfast served hotel lots grab cappuccino eat grocery store street grab fresh baked fruit water juice premade sandwiches etc complete privacy 3 night stay questions patrizia available answer enjoyed stay hotel definitely stay patrizia nice adds energy cost 4500 euro night taxes included stayed hotel september 4 5 6 2010

Reviews.Title: “It's not a hotel, it's a home”
Reviews.Author: LeoCPH
Reviews.Content: wasnt kidding title wrote review home reception flashy sign electronic rome keys literally stay patty visit rome perfect travelled world tried stay friends visits business trip feeling stranger foreign hotel converted apartment rome basic clean shared bathroom toilet clean expected honest patty host shes helpful keys building whenever location unbeatable close metro bus stations 510 minutes walk trevi spanish step lot cafes bakery store overall im glad decided stay time visit rome cant afford paying else stay home

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: tbaileyasm84
Reviews.Content: based reviews id read little apprehensive staying hotel actually 24 hour access bathroom single shared shower bathroom clean ecofriendly hotel didnt change sheets towels everyday conserve change towels nice bathroom shared sink mirror brush teeth etc share bathroom wifi available daytime accessable free location couldnt beat close trevi fountain blocks barbarini metro 2 stops termini main train station mean street noise till late
